name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FOR BIOMEDICAL RESEARCH
description: Trade Association representing public and private biomedical research organizations
sampleDescriptions: Issues regarding biomedical research involving animals
Issues regarding biomedical research involving animals
Outreach regarding Animal Welfare Act issues related to utilization of animals with biomedical research; outreach regarding animal transportation issues for purposes of biomedical research.
FY 22 Appropriations - U.S. Department of Agriculture - Animal and Plant Health Inspection Administration - outreach on funding levels and issues with Animal Welfare Act.
HR 4356 and H.Rept. 117-82 - Agriculture Appropriations - Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service - all provisions regarding Animal Welfare Act enforcement.
